column1: Art Institute of Chicago////After living in the Chicago area all my life
column2: it took me moving out of state and coming back for a vacation to finally get me to visit the Art Institute. For my first time being here
column3: I was certainly blown away. First off
column4: by the shear size of the gallery
column6: by the incredible work. It was awesome to see such famous pieces that I've only ever seen in books or on the internet. The gallery was enjoyable to walk around
column10: the gallery cafe was decent and moderately priced
column11: and the staff were for the most part welcoming to interact with.
